name: Squirt Game
description: Squirt Game is a meme token that looks to merge the adult entertainment industry, adult gaming and adult NFT's into crypto. The SQUIRT token will be used to allow owners to purchase exclusive NFT content, as well as private areas of partner websites. We are also developing a number of adult-themed DApp games, including "Squirt & Burny" and "Squirt17". We are also in latter-stage discussions with a number of high-profile adult performers and influencers, who will act as brand ambassadors for SQUIRT. The Squirt Game tagline is "No rug.... all tug"
